name: Less is MORE
description:
This is my first game jam which I actually uploaded, I lost all my progress in Dani's Basement Jam so I couldn't participate in that. I made a whole video dedicated to this game jam and the making of this game, coming soon or already out! I couldn't playtest with other people so there maybe many bugs. Hope you enjoy this game and make sure to leave some feedback/bug reports in the comments! Made in the Xanderjam Game Jam with Godot v3.2.3

Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
